articles.title: Sweet words from China to US business fail to soothe Washington ire - South China Morning Post
articles.description: As Beijing woos American business leaders, State Department tells them ‘they are not bystanders’ in the broader relationship between the two countries.

articles.author: Luke Goodsell
articles.title: Disney’s Encanto celebrates family, Colombian culture - and the music of Lin-Manuel Miranda - ABC News
articles.description: A misfit teen from a magical family finds her own rhythm in this sweet-natured coming-of-age movie, which represents Disney’s first serious engagement with modern Latin American culture.
articles.content: Disney's latest feature animation their milestone 60th is a Latin American affair, a magic realist fable that celebrates family, culture, and the seemingly inescapable sounds of Lin-Manuel Miranda, t… [+6554 chars]

articles.author: Maegan Vazquez, CNN
articles.title: Biden tells Americans 'we have so much ahead of us' during National Christmas Tree lighting - CNN
articles.description: President Joe Biden expressed optimism for the future of the country during the National Christmas Tree lighting ceremony on Thursday in Washington, telling the American people that "we have so much ahead of us."
